project_name.description: Human-readable name shown in README and page titles.

project_slug.description: Filesystem and package-safe slug derived from project_name by default.

package_name.description: Published name used in package.json. Must be a valid npm name.

rpc_url.description: HTTP endpoint for the node's JSON-RPC service.

chain_id.description: Numeric chain identifier this dapp will target.

services_url.description: Base URL for the optional Studio Services proxy (deploy/verify/faucet).

wallet_provider.description: Choose the transaction signer/provider. 'extension' uses the Animica browser wallet (window.animica). 'sdk' uses a local signer stub for demos.

use_tailwind.description: Adds Tailwind config and utility styles to the project.

use_playwright.description: Adds Playwright config and a basic connect/send test.

include_examples.description: Scaffold example UI components and a Home page wired to RPC and the wallet.
